name: Cannes
fun_fact: Fun fact: Pablo Picasso considered La Potiniere restaurant opposite the Palais des Festivals his favorite haunt during the film festival years, proving that even avant-garde artists appreciated classic French Riviera seafood more than experimental cuisine.
